General.Name: Guangxi Guiguan Electric Power Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Guangxi Guiguan Electric PowerCo.,Ltd. engages in the generation of electricity in China. It is also involved in hydro, thermal, wind, and photovoltaic power generation businesses. The company has an installed capacity of 10.2276 million kilowatts of hydropower, 1.33 million kilowatts of thermal power, and 766,000 kilowatts of wind power. In addition, it invests in power energy projects. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Nanning, China. Guangxi Guiguan Electric PowerCo.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Datang Group Co., Ltd.
